item.description:
Our next meeting will be on May 28th, Wednesday at 7pm.
At this meeting, we'll discuss William P. Young's "The Shack".
Management of Borders in Shrewsbury MA provide tables and chairs for our meetings. We bring our drinks or get one from Seattles's Best Coffee in the store.
item.how_to_find_us: Our table is at the World History Section.
item.why: You'll love it because we are open to different ideas, views, suggestions. We choose "the book of the month" together. It can be any book that we think worth to read. There is always fun and lots of pozitif energy in our group meetings.
item.name: New Earth Book Group May Meeting
